DOC.brief_title: Lidocaine In-situ Gel Before Intrauterine Device Insertion
DOC.criteria: Women take analgesic anxiolytic 24 hour prior insertion Women take misoprostol prior insertion No contraindication history allergic reaction lidocaine Women accept participate study Lidocaine allergy Any contraindication device placement
